snippet: The authorities charged the politician, María Corina Machado, with taking part in a plot to assassinate President Nicolás Maduro, but they did not make evidence public.
abstract: Authorities in Venezuela charge leading opposition politician Maria Corina Machado with taking part in plot to assassinate Pres Nicolas Maduro; Machado denies involvement in plot.
lead_paragraph: The authorities charged the politician, María Corina Machado, with taking part in a plot to assassinate President Nicolás Maduro, but they did not make evidence public.

headline.main: Venezuelan Opposition Politician Charged in Plot to Kill President
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: Opposition Politician Is Charged in Assassination Plot
